about.title: MaraLyrics Chungin
about.mission_p1: MaraLyrics hi Mara hnam hla aw chuang lem nawh khawm nawh theh ding ah kan siah a si. Aw chuang hi culture a langsar bik pawl lak ah a si tih kan rin, hla caka khat hnih cung ah thu tlai a om a si.
about.mission_p2: Kan platform hi thla hnua ding leh tu chhung karlak ah lei — tu khawh in khua khawh ah Mara hla an hmu thei ding ah.
about.why_p1: Mara aw chuang leh hla aw chuang dan hi kan culture identity pawl a si. Community tha a thleng leh an darh lai ah, hi creative thilsiam pawl hi kan ziah khawm a hau — an bo hma ah.
about.why_li1: Mara hla caka collection free leh hmu thei a pek ding
about.why_li2: Aw chuang in Mara aw chuang humhim a tanpui ding
about.why_li3: Mara sa tu leh phuah tu hnathawh an poi ding
about.why_li4: Community in an nawl cultural archive siam ding
about.vision_p1: MaraLyrics hi Mara hla digital archive bik — a nung, a khaw, thla hnua ding in an hman thei ding ah kan hmuh.
about.vision_li1: Mara hla caka collection a lian bik online a siam ding
about.vision_li2: Hla aw leh video reference a belh ding
about.vision_li3: Hla caka aw chuang lian in a translate ding
about.vision_li4: Cultural organization leh school pawl nen a cawlcang ding
about.vision_li5: Community member in an thawh nawh an en thei ding ah
about.community_p1: MaraLyrics hi Mara community tan kan siah a si. Thuthang, hla thawn, leh dik na kan lawm — Mara hla humhim a duh tu vaih taih khan. Kan hla hi thla hnua ding in a nung chhunzawm thei ding.
about.community_p2: I tel duh em? Kan kawl rawh a sie ah thuthang thawn rawh.

contact.title: Kan Kawl Rawh
contact.intro: Zawt na, ngaih dan, a sie ah MaraLyrics ah i pek duh em? I thuthang kan ngai. Hi form hi hluh rawh a sie ah email in kan kawl rawh.
contact.message_placeholder: I thuthang hi ah ziah rawh...
contact.success_text: Kan kawl na ah kan lawm. A rang bik in kan chhang ang.

faq.title: Zawtnak Tam Bik
faq.q1: MaraLyrics hla caka a dik em?
faq.a1: A dik bik ding ah kan chhiar. Hla caka vaih taih hi original recording, official publication, a sie ah community member rinhnak lak ah kan la. Asinain khua dang leh performance dang ah a dang thei. A dik lo i hmu chuan kan Thil Dik Lo Report page in kan theih tir rawh.
faq.q2: MaraLyrics ah hla ka thawn thei em?
faq.a2:
Community hla thawn kan lawm! Hla caka thawn ding ah, kan kawl rawh hi thuthang nen:

  • Hla hming
  • Sa tu / phuah tu hming
  • Hla caka vaih taih
  • Chhana (Gospel, Hmangaih, Culture, Patriotic, a dang)
  • Thuthang dang a awm chuan

Kan editorial team in an en nawh an publish ang.
faq.a3: A si! MaraLyrics a free vek a si. Kan ruahnak hi Mara hla caka tu khawh in an hmu thei ding ah a si. Advertisement a awm thei — site a chhawng ding ah — asinain hla caka hmu na a free chhun ding.
faq.q4: Hla caka copyright a tu ta?
faq.a4: Hla caka vaih taih copyright hi sa tu, phuah tu, leh rights holder pawl ta a si. MaraLyrics hi culture, education, leh personal use tan a lang a si. Hla caka kan ta a si lo. Copyright owner i si nawh removal i duh chuan kan Copyright page en rawh.
faq.q5: Hla caka a dik lo ka report thei em?
faq.a5: Hla page khan "Thuthang Thawn" button i thlak thei, a sie ah kan Thil Dik Lo Report page ah. Hla hming leh thil dik lo a chungin ziah rawh. Kan team in an en nawh dik in an siam ang.
faq.q6: MaraLyrics hla caka ka project ah ka hman thei em?
faq.a6: MaraLyrics hla caka hi culture leh education ding ah a si. Personal, non-commercial use (learning, sa, study) ah i hman thei. Commercial use ding ah original rights holder kawl rawh. Kan Terms & Conditions en rawh.
faq.q7: MaraLyrics in ka data a khawm em?
faq.a7: Platform a chhawng ding ah data tlem kan khawm. Analytics (page views) leh form in i pek thuthang (hming, email). I data kan zuar lo. Thuthang vaih taih ding ah kan Privacy Policy chhiar rawh.
faq.a8:
Tanpui dan:

  • MaraLyrics i rual leh i chhung nen share rawh
  • Hla caka a sie ah dik na thawn rawh
  • Kan Contact page in thuthang pek rawh
  • Mara hla leh culture thu darh rawh

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.date: A hnuai bik ah update: February 15, 2026
privacy.s1_content: MaraLyrics ("kan," "kan ta," a sie ah "kan") hi user privacy humhim ah kan in commit. Hi Privacy Policy hi maralyrics.com leh a subdomain ("Site") ah i thuthang kan khawm dan, kan hman dan, kan pek dan, leh kan humhim dan a sawi a si. Hi policy hi dik taih in chhiar rawh. Site i hman in hi policy ah i pawm a si.
privacy.s2_content:
2.1 I Pek Thuthang

I pek duh in personal thuthang kan khawm thei:

  • Contact form (hming, email, thuthang)
  • Feedback a sie ah error report (hming, email, feedback)
  • Hla caka contribute

2.2 Automatic Khawm Thuthang

Site i hman ah thuthang kan auto-khawm thei:

  • Browser type leh version
  • Operating system
  • Page visit leh hun
  • Referring website
  • IP address (anonymize thei)
  • Device type leh screen size
privacy.s3_content:
Site ah i experience tha ding ah cookies kan hman:

  • Essential Cookies: Site a chhawng ding ah — language leh theme setting.
  • Analytics Cookies: Cloudflare Web Analytics hman in visitor interact dan kan hre.
  • Advertising Cookies: Google AdSense in ad kan lang thei. Ad preference Google Ads Settings ah i siam thei.

Browser settings in cookies i control thei. Cookies i off chuan site feature a chhia thei.
privacy.s4_content:
Thuthang kan khawm hi kan hman ding:

  • Site a chhawng nawh tha thleng ding
  • I zawtnak chhang ding
  • Feedback leh error report en ding
  • User experience tha thleng ding ah hman dan en ding
  • Advertisement lang ding
  • Site security humhim ding
privacy.s5_content: I data hi Cloudflare, Inc. server ah kan khawm. I personal thuthang humhim ding ah technical leh organizational measure kan siam. Asinain internet ah 100% secure thil a awm lo, security vaih taih kan guarantee thei lo.
privacy.s6_content:
Data khawm nawh en ding ah third-party services kan hman thei:

  • Cloudflare: DNS, CDN, security, leh analytics
  • Google AdSense: Advertisement lang nawh siam ding
  • Cloudflare Turnstile: Bot detect nawh spam block ding

Hi services pawl hi an privacy policy an nei, en rawh tih kan chah.
privacy.s7_content:
I khua dang in hi diknak i nei thei:

  • I personal data hmu, dik, a sie ah thla ding
  • I data process na object a sie ah restrict ding
  • Pawm na i lak kir thei hun khawh ah
  • I data copy portable format in request ding

Hi diknak hman ding ah info@maralyrics.com ah kan kawl rawh.
privacy.s8_content: Hi Site hi kum 13 hnuai naupang ding ah a si lo. Naupang personal thuthang kan khawm duh lo. Naupang thuthang kan khawm tih i rin chuan kan kawl rawh.
privacy.s9_content: Hi Privacy Policy hi hun hnih in kan update thei. Thleng na hi hi page ah kan dah ang "A hnuai bik ah update" date nen. Site i hman chhunzawm in thleng na ah i pawm a si.
privacy.s10_content:
Hi Privacy Policy chungin zawtnak i nei chuan kan kawl rawh:

info@maralyrics.com

terms.title: Terms & Conditions
terms.date: A hnuai bik ah update: February 15, 2026
terms.s1_content: MaraLyrics ("Site") i hman in hi Terms & Conditions ("Terms") ah i pawm a si. Hi Terms ah i pawm lo chuan Site i hman suh. Hi Terms hi hun khawh ah thleng kan nei thei, Site i hman chhunzawm in thleng ah i pawm a si.
terms.s2_content: MaraLyrics hi open, non-commercial cultural archive — Mara hla caka humhim ding ah a si. Site hi education, culture, leh archive ding ah a si. Hla caka vaih taih hi personal, non-commercial use ding ah — Mara hla aw chuang poi nawh humhim ding ah.
terms.s3_content:
• Hla Caka: Site ah hla caka vaih taih hi sa tu, phuah tu, leh rights holder pawl ta a si. MaraLyrics in hla caka kan ta lo.
  • Site Content: Website design, code, branding, logo, leh original content (description, UI text, about page pawl) hi MaraLyrics intellectual property a si, permission lo in produce suh.
  • User Contributions: Hla caka, dik na, a sie ah content i thawn in, MaraLyrics ah non-exclusive, royalty-free license i pek a si — Site ah lang nawh archive ding ah.
terms.s4_content:
Site hi hi ding ah i hman thei:

  • Personal, non-commercial hla caka chhiar ding
  • Education a sie ah research ding (attribution nen)
  • Site link share ding
  • Dik na a sie ah thuthang thawn ding

I hman suh:

  • Rights holder permission lo in hla caka reproduce, distribute, a sie ah sell ding
  • Automated tool in Site content scrape ding
  • Site infrastructure disrupt ding
  • Malicious content, spam, a sie ah offensive material upload ding
terms.s5_content:
Content i thawn ah (feedback, error report, contact message, hla caka), i represent:

  • I pek thuthang a dik nawh a tak
  • Content thawn diknak i nei
  • I submission in third-party rights a violate lo

Hi Terms violate a sie ah objectionable user submission thla diknak kan nei.
terms.s6_content:
Site hi "a si ang" leh "a awm ang" in kan pek. MaraLyrics in warranty, express a sie ah implied, a pek lo:

  • Hla caka leh Site thuthang accuracy, completeness, a sie ah currency
  • Site uninterrupted a sie ah error-free availability
  • Site a particular purpose tan fitness
terms.s7_content: Daan in a phal dan bik ah, MaraLyrics leh contributor pawl hi indirect, incidental, special, consequential, a sie ah punitive damages — Site i hman a sie ah hman thei lo na — ah liable kan si lo.
terms.s8_content: Site ah third-party website a sie ah service link a awm thei (social media, music platform). Hi external site content, privacy, a sie ah availability ah kan responsible lo.
terms.s9_content: Hun khawh ah, thuthang lo in, chhan khawh in — hi Terms violate ding tang — Site access restrict a sie ah terminate diknak kan nei.
terms.s10_content: Hi Terms hi applicable law in govern a si. Hi Terms a sie ah Site hman na lak ah dispute a awm chuan good-faith negotiation in resolve ding a si.
terms.s11_content:
Hi Terms chungin zawtnak i nei chuan kan kawl rawh:

info@maralyrics.com

copyright_page.title: Copyright & Removal Request
copyright_page.s1_content: MaraLyrics in sa tu, phuah tu, leh artist intellectual property rights kan poi. Kan platform hi Mara hla aw chuang humhim nawh poi ding ah a om, copyright thil vaih taih responsible nawh rang in kan siam.
copyright_page.s2_content:
Hi Site ah hla caka vaih taih hi sa tu, phuah tu, leh rights holder pawl ta a si. MaraLyrics in hla caka kan ta lo. Hla caka hi personal, cultural, educational, leh archival use ding ah a si.

Website design, code, branding, leh original content (hla caka lo) hi © 2026 MaraLyrics. Rights vaih taih kan humhim.
copyright_page.s3_content:
Copyright holder i si (a sie ah tu hmingah i thawh) nawh MaraLyrics ah i copyrighted work authorization lo in a om tih i rin chuan, removal request i thawn thei. Hi step pawl hi zui rawh:

1

Content Hmuh Na

Copyright material a awm page URL dik thawn rawh.

2

I Identity Pek

I hming vaih taih, copyrighted work nen i paw dan (sa tu, phuah tu, publisher, authorized agent), leh contact thuthang.

3

Statement Pek

Material hman na hi copyright owner, agent, a sie ah daan in authorize a si lo tih i rin statement pek rawh.

4

Request Thawn

Removal request vaih taih hi email rawh:

contact@maralyrics.com
copyright_page.s4_content:
• 48 hours chhung ah i request kan hmu tih kan theih tir ang.
  • Claim kan en nawh verify kan ti ang.
  • Claim a dik chuan ni 7 business chhung ah content kan thla ang.
  • Content a thla zo chuan kan theih tir ang.
copyright_page.s5_content:
• Fraudulent a sie ah bad-faith removal request in daan harsatna a tlawm thei.
  • Request process hma ah thuthang belh kan ngai thei.
  • Content a thla na a dik lo i rin chuan counter-notification kan kawl thei.
copyright_page.s6_content:
Copyright zawtnak ding ah email rawh:

contact@maralyrics.com

Zawtnak dang ding ah kan Contact Us page en rawh.
